text: Viy () is a 1967 Soviet horror movie directed by Konstantin Yershov and Georgi Kropachyov.Скончался режиссер фильма «Вий» Георгий КропачевВий It stars Leonid Kuravlyov, Natalya Varley, and Alexei Glazyrin. ==Actors== * Leonid Kuravlyov as Khoma Brutus * Natalya Varley as Pannochka * Alexei Glazyrin * Vadim Zakharchenko * Nikolai Kutuzov * Pyotr Vesklyarov * Dmitri Kapka == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Russian horror movies Category:1967 horror movies Category:1960s fantasy movies Category:Ukrainian movies Category:Movies set in Ukraine Category:Movies about witchcraft Category:Movies directed by Konstantin Ershov
title: Viy (1967 movie)
